name: Crafted_Salvo_C
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, range by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy and Damage, Range, and Reduces Endurance Cost
